com.bigdata.bop.engine.IQueryDecl

    com.bigdata.bop.engine

    • Uses of IQueryDecl in com.bigdata.bop.engine

      Classes in com.bigdata.bop.engine that implement IQueryDecl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  QueryDecl
      Default implementation.
      Methods in com.bigdata.bop.engine with parameters of type IQueryDecl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void QueryEngine.declareQuery(IQueryDecl queryDecl)
      Deprecated. 
      void IQueryPeer.declareQuery(IQueryDecl queryDecl)
      Deprecated. 
      This method is unused and will probably disappear. The nodes in a cluster reach back to the query controller using IQueryClient.getQuery(UUID) to resolve the query on its first reference. This is handled by the FederatedQueryEngine within its run() loop where it accepts IChunkMessages.

      Deprecated.
